item.title: Zeus and Prot
item.description: After coming home, I started reviewing Prot's progress with the hut this morning. I saw his video post about a pomegranate tree which had mysteriously sprouted. Also, I saw him working like crazy to build this hut. So, after putting some odd links together in my head, I came up with the following screenplay. ğŸ™ƒ I wrote this really fast so I hope it comes across as okay.
